title: Turrets need to ramp up damage faster
body:
I don't mind a turret not doing a lot of damage for the first few shots. However, seriously get annoyed when two people dive me under a turret and one of the tales an excess of three or four turret shots without losing 50% half

No these aren't tanks that I'm talking about. I actually like see tanks absorb turret shots, that's their role. 
I'm talking a riven who builds nothing but BC in terms of HP and still takes shot after shot.
I'm talking about a Yasuo who ults you under a turret and manages to take 4 shots and walks away 
I'm talking about a lee or graves who hops past your turret taking multiple shot only so he can R from the back. 

Riot can we please ramp up the damage turrets do after a few shots. This would enable the game to still end fast but make it a bit harder to turret dive. It just means players need to be slightly more on point when diving

Heres what ive always said.

Tier 1 turrets (farthest out) need to be fast shooting turrets, with first shot being decent damage, but still week, then a harder shot and, after that one, the third hit, and after, will be harder n harder.

Tier 2 turrets need more range through out the lane (not sideways to go over walls), that way, if someone is trying to turret dive you, if they dont hug the wall, they can get hit by two turrets. This turret hits harder than the first, always, doesnt scale, but has a longer range.

Tier 3, inhib turrets, need to be slow, but hard, and splash damage.

Lastly the Nexus Turrets, need to have a mini spawn laser, that should slow +/or burn with either some true damage over time, or hp% of current hp on whoever it is they are focusing

Tier 2 sounds incredibly annoying to try and siege or fight near.  Can't they just be tier 1 turrets and the 3rd be unique?  The range is already pretty good in midlane since there's already champs that take a shot hugging the wall just because of how thin the entrance around tower is (near red).  Like I understand Herald and minions both make pushing easier even with the range but the second it starts shooting if you dont have a long flash/dash read you have minimal escapes and just by existing in midlane even with your team you're in danger of dying.  That's honestly harder than a tier 3 at that point.

Damn yours is better than mine.  Here's your upvote. :P

Taking 3 turret shots at level 3 should be instant death. It's so fucking frustrating having an enemy misplay horribly with someone like Lee or Yasuo THAT EARLY INTO THE GAME and somehow survive. With the stronger junglers getting level 3 and double buffs and coming out of the jungle at full hp, they can afford to turret dive and there's basically no counterplay.
Y'know, I would love to see this in action just to find out how goddamn turtle-heavy it'd make the meta. "No aggression, the turrets hard-counter that."

Aggression is fine, but the turret is meant to be extremely dangerous for the first several minutes of the game. Even if you're being zoned and losing tons of CS, being under a turret at level 3 is meant to be relatively safe. To have 2 enemies attacking you under turret at 3:30, one taking 3 shots and both getting away alive is stupid. If you're going to gank someone under turret and live, you need to either be building AR or it needs to be later in the game, at least 7 mins.

> I'm talking about a Yasuo who ults you under a turret and manages to take 4 shots and walks away

LIAR! 

Yasuo's ultimate Puts him out of tower range, because why not? 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

no what they need instead is to deal % max health damage similar to bork and Ohmwrecker can then be changed to a turret diving item that reduces damage to tanks to live status. that way if tanks dont build it they cant dive for as long but with it they can do what tehy do today because they invested in it. an then you hit two birds with one stone. ohmwrecker then isn't useless.

How the hell is %max damage something you build against? The whole reason to have tanks is to mitigate damage. The best solution is clearly to have them ramp up HARDER in order to prevent extended tower dives. If you get ganked, and they instant kill you it would have happened regardless of the tower, however if you outplay your opponents and force them to take shots they SHOULD get punished for it much harder
you don't build against it. thats my point. it makes turrets a threat to tanks at all phases of the game unless they specifically itemize to turret dive.

They don't need to ramp _faster_ as they're doing max damage starting from the 2nd shot (hell you could honestly say that it's simply the first shot is a freebie), they need to ramp _higher._ They do "100%" on shot 1, and "120%" from shot 2 onwards. They should at least reach the point of doubling.

No, I think they need mechanics to punish the mobility creep we've been receiving over the years. The issue isn't turrets not doing damage it's that there's so many champs that don't give a shit about turret even if they're squishy as hell. 

I say they should have something like "Every 3 shots, the turret fires a special shot that grounds its target for 1 second." Or something like that, they need some kind of ability to scare the hyper mobile champs in the game. You might say this doesn't help with tanks just taking shot upon shot but that should be the high moment for tanks in the late game since carries melt them by that point.
